captions.text:
You wrote scene suggestions
and put them in this red box.

I'll read the suggestions,
they will step forward
and do whatever comes to their minds.
They will improvise what comes to their minds.
Girl, looks like you've been beaten!
Who got the joke, raise your hand.
We have to stay together, man!
It's the only way we can cover...

"Worst excuses to give the bus conductor
when you don't have the ticket money."

I guess that was the longest
one I've ever read.

Hey, I'm under 5 years old,
look at my size!

Sorry, I'm used to cabs, I didn't
know I had to pay for the bus.

In what country we don't pay for the cab?
Just so we know.

"Things you shouldn't say
during a politician speech."

- My fellow voters...
- Get outta there, Junior!

"18th century inventions that
didn't get to us." Look at that...
My dear, I will convince you,

there's nothing better
than this human heater...
And you can get for free...

"Worst things to say
in a graduation speech."
I know this class for about 20 years...

Yeah, we smoked a lot of pot! But
with discipline, y'know what I mean?

'Cause we graduates...
What was I going to say?
"Probable talk between chickens in a freezer."

Oh... My dream is
to spin, spin, spin...

- Hey man, we're set! Let's
get outta here! - No, no!

You ain't going? Bock, bock, bock!
You ain't getting out?

Will you let chicken nuggets
say something?
